scripts.install-local: npm install babel-preset-es2015 babel-preset-react babelify react react-dom stripify --save-dev
scripts.build-html: cat src/html/index.html > public/index.html && cat src/html/_dev_before.html src/html/index.html src/html/_dev_after.html > public/index.html
scripts.build-js: browserify -d -e src/js/main.js -t [ babelify --comments false ] -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > public/js/bundle.js
scripts.build: npm run build-html && npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.dev: npm run watch & browser-sync start --server public --files "public/*.html, public/js/*.js, public/css/*.css" --index="index.html" --browser "google chrome"
scripts.watch: npm run watch-html & npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css & wait
